name: Disconnection Report
query:
SELECT
    dr.name AS "Disconnection ID:Link/Disconnection Request:150",
    dr.customer_name_2 AS "Customer:Data:200",
    dr.reason_for_disconnection AS "Reason for Disconnection:Data:200",
    dr.status AS "Status:Data:120",
    dr.notice_period_start_date AS "Notice Period Start Date:Date:120",
    dr.disconnection_notice_date AS "Disconnection Notice Date:Date:120",

    -- Child table
    cdc.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",

    -- Site Status lookup
    st.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",

    -- Lastmile Services Master fields
    lms.name AS "LMS Name:Link/Lastmile Services Master:150",
    lms.supplier AS "Supplier:Data:200",
    lms.lms_stage AS "LMS Stage:Data:150"

FROM
    `tabDisconnection Request` dr

LEFT JOIN
    `tabCircuit disconnection` cdc
        ON cdc.parent = dr.name

LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` st
        ON st.name = cdc.circuit_id

LEFT JOIN
    `tabLastmile Services Master` lms
        ON lms.circuit_id = cdc.circuit_id
        AND lms.lms_stage IN ('Delivered', 'Disconnection In Process')

WHERE
    dr.docstatus != 2   -- Exclude cancelled, show draft + submitted

ORDER BY
    dr.creation DESC;
